text: new paragraph zoning grant of power single family lots amend rsa by inserting after paragraph v the following new paragraph in the exercise of the powers granted under this subdivision the local legislative body of a city town or county in which there are located unincorporated towns or unorganized places shall allow as a matter of right any lot in a residential zoning district served by water and sewer to be used for four residential dwelling units these may be configured as a single building duplex units single units one duplex unit with accessory dwelling units townhouses or one single family house with accessory dwelling units the lot and yard standards setbacks parking requirements and lot coverage shall be no more restrictive than those required for a single family dwelling all relevant building code and fire code requirements shall still apply this paragraph shall apply to new construction or rehabilitation of existing buildings
